Package main

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
main.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
This is the GameManager class which controls the logic for the game such as opening/closing windows.
Author:
Yunu Cho, Kush Desai

  • Nested Class Summary

    Enum to select next screen.
